S04bsu061_u:3637: katame dve? nānāpadavyañjanaprasannasya mudrā gambhīreṇa dharmanayenātrastasya yathābhūtaṃ pratipannakasya mudrā ca /
S04bsu061_u:3643: bodhisattvā asya gambhīrasyānupaliptasya sūtrāntasya yamakavyatyastāhārasya granthaṃ vā paṭalaṃ vā paṭhanti śṛṇavantyadhimucyante deśayanti, (te)
S04bsu061_u:3647: bodhisattvā dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāmātmānaṃ vraṇayanti gambhīre ca dharme na nidhyāyanti /
S04bsu061_u:3648: katame dve? aśrutapūrva gambhīraṃ sūtrāntaṃ śrutvā,
S04bsu061_u:3650: sa evamasmābhiraśrutapūrvaḥ kuta āgata iti (pṛcchantastaṃ) tyajanti /
S04bsu061_u:3651: ye kulaputrā gambhīraṃ sūtrāntamudgṛhṇanti gambhīradharmabhājanabhūtāśca gambhīraṃ dharma deśayanti,
S04bsu061_u:3652: tebhyo na sevanti cāsamāgamā na paryupāsate tāṃ ca na satkurvanti /
S04bsu061_u:3654: tābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāmādikarmikabodhisattvā ātmānaṃ vraṇayanti gambhīre ca dharme nāvakalpayanti /
S04bsu061_u:3655: “tābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ gambhīrādhimuktika bodhisattvā ātmānaṃ vraṇayanti cānutpattikadharmakṣāntinna labhante /
S04bsu061_u:3656: katame dve? ādikarmikānaciracaritān bodhisattvān avamanyante vimānayanti, na (samā-)
S04bsu061_u:3661: lokasya cāmiṣadānena na tu dharmadānena sattvānupakurvanti /
S04bsu061_u:3662: “maitreya, gambhīradhimuktikabodhisattvā ābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāmātmānaṃ vraṇayanti cānutpattikadharmakṣānti śīghranna labhante” /
S04bsu061_u:3664: bhagavantaṃ bodhisattvo maitreya etadavocat- “bhagavatā yathā subhāṣitam,
S04bsu061_u:3677: adhimucyodgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti parpavāpsyanti viveśayanti likhiṣyanti parebhyaśca vistareṇa samprakāśayiṣyanti /
S04bsu061_u:3703: teṣāṃ dharmabhāṇakānām ā yojanāparisāmantakādrakṣāṃ kariṣyāmo yathā na kaścitteṣāṃ dharmabhāṇakānāmavatāraprekṣyavatāragaveṣyavatāraṃ lapsyate” /
S04bsu061_u:3712: imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ 'vimalakīrtinirdeśaṃ' vā 'yamakavyatyastābhinirhāraṃ' vāpy 'acintyavimokṣaparivartannāma' dharmaparyāyaṃ dhāraya” /
